quote_first:
She said, “Hey sleepy head, time to get up. A Navy SEAL made breakfast, and I don’t think you’re supposed to be late.”
“Aye, aye. What time is it?”
She glanced at the digital clock on her nightstand. “
title: Lionhearts
author: Ray Keating

quote_first: Sloane, with his shoulder punctured, was on another lounge. He was half delirious, and kept calling something about a chemistry lecture at
title: This Side of Paradise
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

title: The Curious Incident of the Dog in the Night-Time
author: Mark Haddon

quote_last: . To sleep 7:15. (Appear to have lost my watch without realising it, had to drive into town to buy another.)
title: The Voices of Time
author: JG Ballard
